Here's a plan for the quick sort implementation:

- Write a recursive subroutine quicksort that takes an array, the left and right indices. - Choose a pivot element.
children.label: high_level_plan

children.text: - Partition the array into elements greater than or equal to the pivot (to the left) and elements less than the pivot (to the right).
children.label: high_level_plan

children.text: Alternatively, write a non-recursive implementation. But for the sake of time, let's find a sample implementation of quick sort in Fortran.
children.label: high_level_plan

children.text:
Alternatively, adapt code from online. For example, here's a sample quicksort implementation in Fortran for an integer array:

recursive subroutine quicksort(a, first, last)
  implicit none
  integer, intent(inout) :: a(:)
  integer, intent(in) :: first, last
  integer :: pivot, i, j, temp

  if (first < last) then
    pivot = a((first + last)/2) i = first
    j = last
    do while (i <= j)
      do while (a(i) > pivot) i = i + 1
      end do
      do while (a(j) < pivot)
        j = j - 1
      end do
      if (i <= j) then
        temp = a(i)
        a(i) = a(j)
        a(j) = temp i = i + 1
        j = j - 1
      end if
    end do
    call quicksort(a, first, j)
    call quicksort(a, i, last)
children.label: code_analysis

children.text:
end if
end subroutine quicksort

children.text:
For descending order, compare to be greater than. So, the code would look something like:

recursive subroutine quicksort_desc(a, low, high)
  implicit none
  integer, intent(inout) :: a(:)
  integer, intent(in) :: low, high
  integer :: pivot, i, j, temp

  if (low < high) then
    pivot = a(high)
    i = low - 1
    do j = low, high-1
      if (a(j) >= pivot) then
        i = i + 1
        temp = a(i)
        a(i) = a(j)
        a(j) = temp
      end if
    end do
    temp = a(i+1)
    a(i+1) = a(high)
    a(high) = temp
    call quicksort_desc(a, low, i)
    call quicksort_desc(a, i+2, high)
  end if
end subroutine quicksort_desc

This is a Lomuto partition scheme.

    recursive subroutine quicksort_desc(a, low, high)
        integer, intent(inout) :: a(:)
        integer, intent(in) :: low, high
        integer :: pivot, i, j, temp

        if (low < high) then
            pivot = a(high)
            i = low - 1 do j = low, high - 1
                if (a(j) >= pivot) then i = i + 1
                    temp = a(i)
                    a(i) = a(j)
                    a(j) = temp
                end if
            end do
            temp = a(i + 1)
            a(i + 1) = a(high)
            a(high) = temp
            call quicksort_desc(a, low, i)
            call quicksort_desc(a, i + 2, high)
        end if
    end subroutine quicksort_desc
end program main

program main
    implicit none
    integer :: n, i, val, ans

        if (mod(i-1, 2) == 0) then

        else
            vo(val) = vo(val) + 1
        end if
    end do
    !

recursive subroutine quicksort(a, first, last)
  implicit none
  integer, intent(inout) :: a(:)
  integer, intent(in) :: first, last
  integer :: pivot, i, j, temp

  if (first < last) then
    pivot = a((first + last)/2)
    i = first
    j = last
    do while (i <= j)
      do while (a(i) > pivot)
        i = i + 1
      end do
      do while (a(j) < pivot)
        j = j - 1
      end do
      if (i <= j) then
        temp = a(i)
        a(i) = a(j)
        a(j) = temp
        i = i + 1
        j = j - 1
      end if
    end do
    call quicksort(a, first, j)
    call quicksort(a, i, last)
  end if
end subroutine quicksort

recursive subroutine quicksort_desc(a, low, high)
  implicit none
  integer, intent(inout) :: a(:)
  integer, intent(in) :: low, high
  integer :: pivot, i, j, temp

  if (low < high) then
    pivot = a(high)
    i = low - 1
    do j = low, high-1
      if (a(j) >= pivot) then
        i = i + 1
        temp = a(i)
        a(i) = a(j)
        a(j) = temp
      end if
    end do
    temp = a(i+1)
    a(i+1) = a(high)
    a(high) = temp
    call quicksort_desc(a, low, i)
    call quicksort_desc(a, i+2, high)
  end if
end subroutine quicksort_desc

    do i = 1, n
        val = v(i)
        vt(val) = vt(val) + 1
        if (mod(i-1, 2) == 0) then
            ve(val) = ve(val) + 1
        else
            vo(val) = vo(val) + 1
        end if
    end do
    ! Sort arrays in descending order
    call quicksort_desc(vo, 1, 100010)
    call quicksort_desc(ve, 1, 100010)
    call quicksort_desc(vt, 1, 100010)
    ! Compute ans
    if (vo(1) + ve(1) == vt(1)) then
        ans = min(n - vo(1) - ve(2), n - vo(2) - ve(1))
    else
        ans = n - vo(1) - ve(1)
    end if
    ! Output result
    print*, ans
contains
    recursive subroutine quicksort_desc(a, low, high)
        integer, intent(inout) :: a(:)
        integer, intent(in) :: low, high
        integer :: pivot, i, j, temp

        if (low < high) then
            pivot = a(high)
            i = low - 1
            do j = low, high - 1
                if (a(j) >= pivot) then
                    i = i + 1
                    temp = a(i)
                    a(i) = a(j)
                    a(j) = temp
                end if
            end do
            temp = a(i + 1)
            a(i + 1) = a(high)
            a(high) = temp
            call quicksort_desc(a, low, i)
            call quicksort_desc(a, i + 2, high)
        end if
    end subroutine quicksort_desc
end program main
